name: react-native-warpdrive
description: In-App upgrade service for React-Native! Supporting iOS and Android apps

scripts.postinstall: cd ./ios/Warpify.framework && ln -s Versions/A/Modules Modules && ln -s Versions/A/Resources Resources && ln -s Versions/A/Headers Headers && ln -s Versions/A/Warpify Warpify

author: Ali Najafizadeh
